forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Patchy drizzle. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 56. West southwest wind around 7 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

forecast.name: Friday
forecast.detailedForecast: Patchy drizzle before 11am. Partly sunny. High near 63, with temperatures falling to around 61 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 7 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

weather_report:
As dawn breaks over Downtown San Francisco, a delicate drizzle carries a gentle whisper across the streets, lending an ethereal quality to the cityscape. The air is a tempered 56 degrees, the breeze from the west-southwest lightly brushing against the skin, offering a refreshing caress that hints at the day ahead. The sky, a muted canvas of gray, suggests a lingering marine layer, likely obscuring the famous Golden Gate Bridge from full view while adding a mystique to the landmarks that dot the horizon.

As we move into the day, expect patchy drizzle to taper off by mid-morning, giving way to moments of sun piercing through the clouds. The high temperature will dance around 63 degrees, gradually easing down to a cooler 61 by afternoon. Winds will whip through at a lively pace of 7 to 15 mph, with occasional bursts nudging 22 mph, urging one to secure hats and scarves against their playful thrusts. 

Considering the atmospheric conditions, dressing in layers would be wise. A light jacket, perhaps with a waterproof exterior, will suffice against the morning dampness, while a breathable sweater underneath offers comfort as the sun emerges. Activities may revolve around leisurely strolls in local parks, where the freshness of the rain-soaked earth mingles with the fragrance of blooming flora—inviting for a moment of reflection while sipping a warm cup of coffee. Alternatively, one might find joy in visiting the cozy galleries or unique shops scattered throughout the neighborhood, experiencing the vibrant city pulse, all while savoring the subtle charms that a fog-kissed day can bring.
